General.Description: Enigma (ENG) is considered as a decentralized data marketplace. Enigmaâ€™s computational model is based on an optimized version of secure multi-party computation, backed by a verifiable secret-sharing scheme. For storage, Enigma uses a modified distributed hashtable for holding secret-shared data. An external blockchain is utilized as the controller of the network. It manages access control, identities and serves as a tamper-proof log of events. Security deposits are required and fees are charged in order to incentivize operation, correctness and fairness in the system. ENG is an Ethereum-based ERC 20 token that serves as currency on Enigma's network.
General.Features: The ENG has been guaranteed the user's privacy of data. Moreover, it is centralized systems and their structure, therefore, it can lead to misaligned incentives, corruption, and protect your security. You will not worry about the privacy because Enigma is run on its unique technology. The Enigma protocol will be helpful for many industries such as finance, health, identity, and credit.
General.Technology: Built on data marketplace Catalyst, the first application platform to drive data for investing and researching. Moreover, the ENG allows customers to empowerto building the accurate data and build profitable, data-driven investment strategies.
